Dating: LATE PERIOD (not before); PTOLEMAIC PERIOD (not after)
Name: Unfinished statuette of a man
Description: This statuette of a man shows an already well-modelled body,  but without details, with the exception of the left foot, where one notices the finely sculpted toes. As several similar examples show, the head and the neck were never meant to be executed. All the surfaces present the marks of straight and rounded chiselling.
